name: Jeanette
text: You know what i really like Hungry Howies! That oven sub is everything! I get the large and its always made right and super hot i just wish they delivered to my area or did doordash or ubereats.

name: Tim Henrick
text: The food uasually shows up faster than what they tell me, and it's all ways delicious. This place is on point!

name: Terrie Stites
text: Couldn't take my order because they didn't know how to use the register. Went to Mickeys, quality had gone down there as well. Two brothers battling for their spot in melvindale and both doing poorly. What will they do when Happy's opens!! Especially with a drive thru window???

name: Tiffany williams

name: Mr. Nice Guy

name: Jenny G.
text: The manager at this store is wonderful! I have a child with severe food allergies and he was kind enough to double check ingredients for us. This is a huge deal for families like us! Thank you so much and we will definitely be back.

name: Lillie Collins
text: Usually when I pay for extra cheese from other hungry Howies they barely put any on but, this hungry Howies loaded the pizza up making it the best hungry Howies pizza I've ever had. If you dont add 2x cajun butter you're losing out. 3 cheeser pleaser with extra cheese and cajun butter. Get it!
